name: Forbidden Library
description:
The elusive Miss Kalaya is famed for having one of the most complete libraries about the occult and the supernatural. However, very few are allowed to see it.

However, when a mysterious investigator arrives to her house in the dead of night, everything takes a disturbing turn, especially when both visitor and host seem to have their own agenda...

A short horror game made with Rpg Maker VXAce, loosely inspired by "The Witch's House". You will have to explore Kalaya's house to retrieve the items you need to survive and escape.
